Label: dehydrogenase
Comment: Facilitates the conversion of L-aspartate-semialdehyde to homoserine.

Label: dehydrogenase
Comment: Facilitates the conversion of L-aspartyl-4-phosphate to L-aspartate-semialdehyde.

Label: aspartate kinase
Comment: Facilitates the conversion of L-aspartate to L-aspartyl-4-phosphate.
